Popped into the Playscheme at Oaklands today. Karen, her hard working team & the young people enjoying the experience...helped by the sunshine. Reviewing the playscheme & wider disability services to better support young people with disabilities & their families across the city. https://t.co/3NhufjZ7Op
'If you never give up, you can reach your goals. Just talk to your soul and say...believe.' @6VTYouthCafe finale at TheBigYThingy today. #YOYP2018 https://t.co/xMtm83CAmW
